author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tile shower wall tip…lasers are your friend. I use one to project the tile edge from the first wall on the second wall. This helps me get the exact dimension. I always factor in an expansion joint. Both at the floor and adjacent wall. Normally I use the Masterpiuma to score and snap tiles. The end result is what matters the most 👍🏽🔥#tile #tilework #showerremodel #bathroomreno
title: Tile Shower Wall Tip - #shorts #homerepairtutor
